import React from "react"; const Cart = ({CartItems, setCartItems, handleChange}) => { return(
{ CartItems.length === 0 ?
Your Cart is Empty
:
{ CartItems.map((item) => (

{item.name_product}

price : {item.price_product} DH
)) }
Total Price of your Cart : {price} DH
Send Order
}
) } export default Cart
